name: Gertrude's Archaeological Adventure
description:
Assets used in this project were sourced from "Crates And Barrels Pack Volume 1 - Free Version" by Ricochet, "Animated low poly spider" by Cattleya, "Stylized San Pillar" by Lowpoly, "Nefertiti" by Gargore, "Egyptian Tomb: Cat Statue" by Nokobot, "Meshtint Free Chicken Mega Toon Series" by Meshtint Studio, "Stylized house" by NIKITA00, and "polydesert" by Runemark Studio

The levels experiment with layout and designs centered around jumping and automatic pathing. I aimed to create a three dimensional platformer that utilized a familiar Egyptian theme relating to archaeology.

I wanted to convey admiration and appreciation for Gertrude Bell, a famed archaeologist. This simple game is supposed to interest people in basic archaeology and stir the desire for adventure and exploration.
